'''Fontainian Foie Gras''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe is purchased from [[Sanguinetti]] in [[Hotel Debord]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

==Recipe==

|type = Cooking
|Fowl = 2
